Articles.Content:
We are all know that KSP updates usually releases on tuesday, so my inner Vanga tells me that 1.0.5 will released on october 13 and 1.1 will released on december 22 or december 29.

And what tells your inner Vanga about it?

/discuss
That this thread will soon be locked?

Wow, you can predict the future

Lets leave speculation as to the release date alone, thank you, especially when your guess is only a few days away, as you will get people overexcited for nothing.
